version_description:
Update the app for an exclusive offer and more:

- Get 50% off our yearly plan with the newest version of the Skoove app! Offer ends August 1
- Continue with your current lesson when you re-open the app
- And, of course, the usual improvements and bug fixes

Update to the latest version of the app to enjoy:

- Improved pitch detection: Skoove is now even more precise in recognising what you are playing!
- Improvements and bug fixes

- The biggest songs addition ever on Skoove! More than 30 new songs for beginners! Learn and play all the tunes you need to bring your repertoire to the next level: timeless hits, movie soundtracks, modern and classical songs!Check it out now!
- Not sure where you left last time? Don’t worry, Skoove now remembers exactly where you were so that you can go ahead at full speed!
- Various bug fixes and enhancements

- Skoove is now available in Spanish, French, Japanese, Korean, traditional and simplified Chinese!

- Bug fixes and improvements

- Skoove is now available in Spanish, French, Japanese, Korean, traditional and simplified Chinese!

- Bug fixes and improvements

Bring the fun of playing piano to your iPhone! Yes, with this update you can run Skoove on iPhone too, download it now!

Update the app on iPad - it comes with many bug fixes and improvements

Skoove is the easiest way to learn piano. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before.

It comes with many improvements and bug fixes for an even better experience.

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5 star rating and share your fun with the community!

Hey piano player! We’ve got an exciting new feature with this update that will make your piano-learning even more fun, personalised and effective:

Your personal dashboard will give you an overview of your current progress, advice on the best next lessons for you and suggestions of new songs to learn! Update now to improve faster, keep track of your piano journey and stay up to date with the latest songs and lessons!

Love Skoove? Give us a 5 star rating and share your fun with the community!

Hey piano player! We’ve got an exciting new feature with this update that will make your piano-learning even more fun, personalised and effective:

Your personal dashboard will give you an overview of your current progress, advice on the best next lessons for you and suggestions of new songs to learn! Update now to improve faster, keep track of your piano journey and stay up to date with the latest songs and lessons! (Since 1.5.0)

1.5.1 fixes a few minor bugs on the new dashboard.

* In the previous version, the screen lock would sometimes become active during practicing. We now keep the screen lit and active
* During fast playing, the slider would sometimes slide backwards instead of looping. It now loops.
* The Next Button (to go to the next lesson step) is now shown whenever it needs to be shown.

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- We fixed the position of the dialog that warns users if their device performance may be below lesson requirements.
- We fixed a bug preventing some premium subscribers from accessing premium content.
- We also prepared everything for our Florian Christl course (which will be released in the coming days).

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- Beginner Course 1 is available in Japanese, Korean, and Mandarin
- New Florian Christl song 'Fly' has been released

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

- The handvideo in the Beginner 1 course is now shown when it should be shown
- Various bugfixes

- Translated app store video to Japanese, Korean, and Chinese

- Updated App Store screenshots
- Added Sign in with Apple support

- Fix featured songs lock icon

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove's AI-powered app. This major release comes with an all new learning experience:
- New AI-based note detection for more precise and richer feedback while you play
- All new look and feel for a seamless learning flow adapted to your level
- Videos and personalized voice overs in all supported languages
- and much more

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- New Lesson Steps
- Support for App Tracking Transparency Framework

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- Change the tempo! Now you can slow down the songs you are learning in order to perfect them at your own pace
- Create loops! The looping tool allows you to start your practice from anywhere in a song and loop the tricky sections, meaning you can really hone in on those sticking points

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- Quicker and smoother note recognition means an uninterrupted playing experience
- Improved pitch detection for users using a microphone means less disruption from background noises and interference
- Skoove now adapts to users’ listening environment on acoustic mode, depending on whether they’re using headphones or not. This reduces background noise meaning better note recognition!
- Interface improvements offer a clearer, cleaner and more enjoyable learning experience

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- Updated design to improve consistency of user experience
- General improvements & bug fixes

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!

Set your mind free and learn how to play the piano with Skoove’s AI-powered app. We listened to your feedback and released an update that’s better than ever before:

- Improved user experience during authentication
- Fixes to minor bugs

How do you like Skoove? Give us a 5-star rating and share your fun with the community!
